certifications.title: Git Certified Specialist - Version Control & Collaboration
certifications.description: Professional certification in Git version control systems, covering advanced Git workflows, branching strategies, collaboration techniques, and distributed version control best practices.

certifications.title: LFD103: A Beginner's Guide to Linux Kernel Development
certifications.description: Comprehensive course on Linux kernel development fundamentals, covering kernel architecture, development practices, and system-level programming concepts.

certifications.title: Programming in C & Object Oriented Programming using C++
certifications.description: Advanced programming certification covering C fundamentals and object-oriented programming concepts in C++.

certifications.title: CEH - Certified Ethical Hacking (Certified Ethical Hacker)
certifications.description: Comprehensive ethical hacking certification covering penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and cybersecurity best practices.
